parts.text:
ImageClassification

```json
{
  "application": "Image Classification",
  "framework": "MXNet",
  "requirements": {
    "resources": {
      "DGXSYSTEM": "required",
      "CONT": "required",
      "MLPERF_RULESET": "optional, default: 3.0.0",
      "MLPERF_CLUSTER_NAME": "optional, default: 'unknown'",
      "NEXP": "optional, default: 5",
      "DATESTAMP": "optional, default: current date & time",
      "CLEAR_CACHES": "optional, default: 1",
      "CHECK_COMPLIANCE": "optional, default: 1",
      "LOGDIR": "optional, default: ./results",
      "ABSLOGDIR": "optional, default: ${PWD}/results",
      "POWERCMDDIR": "optional, default: /lustre/fsw/mlperft/users/qiyuw/optimized/mlperf_utils",
      "MEASURE_POWER": "optional, default: 0",
      "COPY_DATASET": "optional",
      "API_LOG_DIR": "optional, default: ./api_logs",
      "DROPCACHE_CMD": "optional, default: \"sudo /sbin/sysctl vm.drop_caches=3\"",
      "CLK_GROUP_IDX": "optional, default: 0",
      "CLK_GROUP_SIZE": "optional, default: 4",
      "TIME_TAGS": "optional",
      "NVTX_FLAG": "optional",
      "NCCL_TEST": "optional",
      "SYNTH_DATA": "optional",
      "EPOCH_PROF": "optional",
      "DISABLE_CG": "optional",
      "SEED": "optional",
      "MNT_TARFILE_PATH": "optional",
      "TMP_ROOT_PATH": "optional",
      "TMP_MD5SUM": "optional",
      "DATADIR": "optional",
      "DATADIR_TMP": "optional",
      "CODEDIR": "optional",
      "BATCHSIZE": "optional",
      "DGXNNODES": "optional",
      "DGXNGPU": "optional",
      "README_PREFIX": "optional",
      "APILOG_PRECISION": "optional",
      "JET": "optional",
      "JET_DIR": "optional",
      "JET_CREATE": "optional",
      "JET_UPLOAD": "optional"
    },
    "software": {
      "MLPerf logging utilities": "required",
      "Python": "required",
      "MXNet": "required",
      "NCCL": "optional",
      "IB Verbs": "optional",
      "NVIDIA SMI": "optional",
      "Slurm": "required",
      "jq": "optional",
      "power_monitor.sh": "optional",
      "manage-tmp-data": "optional",
      "copy-data.sh": "optional",
      "run_and_time.sh": "required",
      "mlperf_logging.compliance_checker": "optional",
      "enroot": "optional"
    },
    "environment": {
      "DGX System": "required",
      "Lustre": "optional"
    }
  },
  "description": "This script runs a benchmark for image classification using MXNet and reports the time to convergence. It uses Slurm for job management and includes features such as power measurement, data management, compliance checking, and containerization."
}
```
